Package org.opengrok.suggest.popular

Interface PopularityMap

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, PopularityCounter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChronicleMapAdapter
    public interface PopularityMap
extends PopularityCounter, AutoCloseable
    Abstraction for the map to store the data for most popular completion.
